Steps to reproduce:

1) Log to any never before logged web page.
2) The Remember Password Notification Pop ups.



Actual results:

Since I wanted to not ever remember the password for the site, or not now, I have to press on the dropdown button first, and then a second time on the choice, so, 2 clicks.


Expected results:

There is a lot of space on the screen there should only appear 2 buttons, "save password" and "not now" from which a dropdown to "never for this site".

Look at Chromes implementation.
